department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程主要在介紹心理學實驗中常用的敘述統計及推論統計的基本觀念及其相互間的關係，同學會更加了解基本觀念如母體、樣本、參數、樣本統計量等，課程中會學習如何有效的整理實驗數據並利用圖形將數值表達出來，課程中將會介紹推論統計的假設檢定方法如兩母體假設檢定、變異數分析、卡方分析、簡單回歸分析等，並學習如何根據樣本的性質來決定合適的假設檢定方法。課程中將會使用SPSS統計軟體來做相關資料分析及繪製統計圖表。
goal.en: “This course will provide students with an overview of descriptive and inferential statistics commonly used in psychological research. Students will learn how to organize and graph data sets and to evaluate the data distribution effectively. Basic statistical concepts such as sample, population, normal distribution and confidence intervals, etc. will be reviewed. The course will introduce students to different types of hypothesis-testing procedures such as t-test, analysis of variance, and the general linear model approach. Students will develop the ability to effectively apply the appropriate statistical methods for given population means. Throughout the course, the statistical software SPSS will be used to display graphical representations and conduct statistical analyses for various data sets.“

outline.ch: 課程內容涵蓋資料的性質與整理、統計表與統計圖、機率論、抽樣與抽樣分配 假設檢定 兩母體的統計估計與假設檢定、變異數分析、卡方分析、簡單回歸分析與相關分析
outline.en: “The course will cover topics including descriptive statistics, organizing and graphing data, sampling distributions, discrete and continuous random variables, the normal distribution, estimation of the mean and proportion, hypothesis testing, Chi-Square tests, analysis of variance, and simple linear regression.“

textbook.ch: 統計學(第九版) by Allan G. Bluman McGraw-Hill Education 2014吳榮彬譯
textbook.en: “Introductory Statistics (7th edition) by Prem S. Mann.  John Wiley ＆ Sons Inc.A Simple Guide to IBM SPSS Statistics for Version 22.0 Kirkpatrick ＆ Feeney Statistical methods for psychology. (7th edition) by D. C. Howell. Thomson Wadsworth, USA“

gradMethod.ch:
“出席率與參與 10％
習題 30％
期中考 30％
期末考 30％“
gradMethod.en:
“Participation and attendance 10％
Homework Assignments 30％
Midterm Exam 30％
Final Exam 30％“

officeHour.ch: 星期三11-12 或另行與教師預約

flexDiscription.ch:
應用程式(MatLab/SPSS)統計軟體做線上資料分析以及解題(線上資料及題目放置於
new eeclass教學平台)
flexDiscription.en:
Students will apply MatLab and SPSS programs to do online problem solving and 
data analysis (data and problem set will be placed on class website via new eeclass)

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班。年級:限一年級。
系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班。年級:限非一年級。
系所:限認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。

Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
